useAlerts can only be used within Alerts: useAlerts can only be used within AlertsContext.Provider
Download template instance YAML file to: Download template instance YAML file to instantiate the template
(optional) Provide values if contains pa: (optional) Provide values if contains parameters without default values
oc apply the downloaded and edited file: oc apply the downloaded and edited file
Configure the template quota permissions: Configure the template quota permissions to see here who uses this template and what cost has spent.
This template may be accessible to more: This template may be accessible to more users than those listed below. Global permissions are granted to Kube-admin. Check out each namespace to know who can access this template.
No clusters associated with this templat: No clusters associated with this template yet
Clusters created using this template wil: Clusters created using this template will appear here.
Name: Name
Create a RoleBinding granting the select: Create a RoleBinding granting the selected users the <2></2> role in the selected namespace. This role provides the minimum permissions needed for using the cluster templates.
Enter the amount you wish to limit for t: Enter the amount you wish to limit for this user/group. The minimum amount is {{cost}}.
The budget must exceed the cost of the c: The budget must exceed the cost of the cluster template: {{cost}}
Each namespace can only have one quota,: Each namespace can only have one quota, only available ones appear in the list.
A quota provides constraints that limit: A quota provides constraints that limit aggregate cluster consumption per namespace.
Are you sure you want to delete?: Are you sure you want to delete?
The cluster templates could not be loade: The cluster templates could not be loaded.
Failed to save the cluster template: Failed to save the cluster template
All data entered will be lost: All data entered will be lost
Specify the target namespace for the app: Specify the target namespace for the application's resources. The namespace will only be set for namespace-scoped resources that have not set a value for .metadata.namespace
Use the same as the cluster template ins: Use the same as the cluster template instance
Failed to load Helm chart repositories: Failed to load Helm chart repositories
Choose a quota you want be assosiated wi: Choose a quota you want be assosiated with this cluster template. You can manage the existing quotas in the <2></2>.<4></4>Quotas can also be set and changed after the cluster template has been added.
Limit the number of clusters created fro: Limit the number of clusters created from this template
Select the helm charts to install on clu: Select the helm charts to install on clusters created by this template. The cluster will only be available after they are installed.
Specify how much money to spend on each: Specify how much money to spend on each usage of this cluster template. You can use any type of currency.
Describe when and how to use this templa: Describe when and how to use this template, what are the preconditions of using it, and add links to relevant documentation if needed. <2>See formatting instructions</2>
Add credentials and certificates to conn: Add credentials and certificates to connect to private Helm chart repository.
URL must be a valid URL starting with \": URL must be a valid URL starting with "http://" or "https://"
Failed to get ArgoCDSecret for url {{url: Failed to get ArgoCDSecret for url {{url}}
Select the Helm chart repository that co: Select the Helm chart repository that contains the Helm Chart you would like to use for this cluster template.
Please enter a value smaller than {{max}: Please enter a value smaller than {{max}}
Use lowercase alphanumeric characters, d: Use lowercase alphanumeric characters, dot (.) or hyphen (-)
Use lowercase alphanumeric characters, o: Use lowercase alphanumeric characters, or hyphen (-)
Must start and end with an lowercase alp: Must start and end with an lowercase alphanumeric character
Failed to parse values of chart {{chart}: Failed to parse values of chart {{chart}}
Cluster template doesn't contain a statu: Cluster template doesn't contain a status
